headline.main: Media Turns Detective With 'The Jinx,' Other Murder Cases
headline.print_headline: Media Turns Detective With 'The Jinx,' Other Murder Cases

docs.snippet: “The Jinx,” a six-part HBO documentary series about Robert A. Durst, raises questions about whether the filmmakers had a responsibility to share their discoveries with the police....
docs.lead_paragraph: “The Jinx,” a six-part HBO documentary series about Robert A. Durst, raises questions about whether the filmmakers had a responsibility to share their discoveries with the police.
docs.abstract: Andrew Jarecki and Marc Smerling documentary series The Jinx got a lucky dose of publicity before its finale when film's subject Robert A Durst was arrested on murder charge, but timing also raises ethical concerns; Durst apparently confessed to several murders in series, which underscores questions about the responsibilities filmmakers and journalists have when they uncover evidence in ongoing investigations.

headline.main: Irresistible TV, but Durst Film Tests Ethics, Too
headline.print_headline: Irresistible TV, but Durst Film Tests Ethics, Too

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst (TV Program)

docs.snippet: Michel Martelly runs Haiti without a Parliament and has been accused of protecting a network of friends who have been arrested on charges like murder and drug trafficking....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michel Martelly runs Haiti without a Parliament and has been accused of protecting a network of friends who have been arrested on charges like murder and drug trafficking.
docs.abstract: Haiti's Parliament remains empty after Pres Michel Martelly and opposition could not agree on elections, allowing Martelly to govern country for two months by executive order without checks and balances; Martelly's administration has come under increasing criticism as scandals involving those close to him have continued to be revealed, raising questions about his ability to lead.

headline.main: Haitian Leader’s Power Grows as Scandals Swirl
headline.print_headline: Haitian Leader’s Power Grows as Scandals Swirl
